amendment.description: To limit the availability of funds for the Intelligence Community Management Account pending a report on the development and use of intelligence relating to Iraq and Operation Iraqi Freedom.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1277 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 34. Record Vote Number: 287.

Amendment SA 1277 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S9520-9529, S9545; text: CR S9520) To limit the availability of funds for the Intelligence Community Management Account pending a report on the development and use of intelligence relating to Iraq and Operation Iraqi Freedom.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1277 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 34. Record Vote Number: 287.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1277 proposed by Senator Durbin.
